name: Faceball 2022
description:
What began as an experiment to see if I could render 3D at all has evolved into a simple take on Faceball, the smily-faced FPS. Type your own face, choose your shape, and shoot up your friends.

This is online multiplayer only, and everyone gets lumped into one arena. I have no idea what happens if a ton of people join. Made using the Paster addon and a lot of math. Browser security apparently disagrees with mouselook, so I disabled it.

WASD - move
QE←→ - turn
Space - shoot
Shift - run
P - pause
